item.name: MIRABase
item.description: The base of MIRA. A MIRA core component containing acollection of classes and tools that are used by allother MIRA components.
item.author: Tim Langner;Erik Einhorn;Ronny Stricker;Christian Martin
item.changelog:
Version 0.27.0 (Release date: 2014-03-19)
-----------------------------------------
- added StripedStorage::getFiles() to return a list of all files used for
persistent storage
- added reflect for std::bitset<N>
- added FromOct<T>, ToHex<T> and ToOct<T> functions for use with toString and fromString
- extractPaths() creates a vector of unique path entries
- fixed segfault in XMLDom when copying nodes without associated uri
- XMLDom: added support to retrieve prefix and href of namespace from nodes and attributes
- added Process::interruptChildOnParentDeath flag to terminate a child process if parent dies
- XMLDom: added methods to add, insert comments and content before and after a node and replace nodes by comment or content nodes
- added XMLDomPreprocessor class that allows to add user defined callbacks for special xml variable patterns
- added support for including text files as content in xml documents
- handle error case when deserializing binary data of a newer version of a type into an older version
- Process::createProcess() now allows to specify the environment of the new process

Version 0.26.0 (Release date: 2014-02-25)
-----------------------------------------
- made reflect methods for XMLDom inline
- Process class now supports redirection of stdin, stdout and stderr streams
allowing to send and receive data from the child streams
- added JSON type trait for long double

Version 0.25.0 (Release date: 2014-02-09)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed MetaSerializer for use with std::vector<bool>
- fixed serialization of std::vector<bool>
- LinearInterpolator now handles the cases correctly where the samples are
close or equal to eachother
- fixed findpkg when mira config folder does not exist

Version 0.24.0 (Release date: 2014-01-14)
-----------------------------------------
- introduced new syntax <package>:<path> for specifying paths relative to packages
- added methods for printing a progress bar to the console (PrintProgressBar.h)
- added method AbstractTransformerNode::isAncestorOf()
- findPackages() now takes the maxAge parameter into account
- removed deprecated Square.h header, use pow2() from Power.h instead
- allow to add a link from a transform node to a parent node even if it was connected to another parent already (relinking)
- added XMLDom::sibling_iterator::add_child(XMLDom::const_sibling_iterator node)
- added methods to set uri of XML documents and siblings
- using uri path for resolving includes in XML files now
- added basic support for Eigen::SparseMatrix serialization
- added flag to JSONSerializer that activates reflection of read only properties (only for output, not for deserialization)
- print() now uses JSONSerializer with reflection of read only properties
- EigenFormat is now const-correct and predefined EigenFormats now allow to specify a precision parameter for output
- added eulerAngles() method to be independent of the varying implementation in different Eigen versions

Version 0.23.0 (Release date: 2013-11-15)
-----------------------------------------
- Eigen::Vector3 and Vector4 are now supported by the PropertySerializer and hence the property editor
- moved several color maps to the package 'Colormaps'
- resolving variables in message text for warning, error, notice and abort tags
- added GeneralBresenhamLineIterator, a generic D-dimensional Bresenham line iterator
- added RasterTransformation for fast transformation of 2D raster as base e.g. for image rotation and scaling
- using atomic increment when generating ids for JSON RPC requests
- changing MIRA_PATH variable leads to re-indexing of package cache
- added getMIRAPaths() to get the list of all mira project paths
- added polygonFromLine() method to convert lines to polygons

Version 0.22.0 (Release date: 2013-08-28)
-----------------------------------------
- added methods to gain access to internal data representation in Stamped<>
- added MIRA_ALIGN macro in platform/Align.h for data alignment at memory boundaries
- turned exception into warning if serial port fails to clear special custom baudrate flag
- added new colormaps
- fixed infinite loop in uncompressBuffer() with buffers that contain a single compressed byte of data

Version 0.21.0 (Release date: 2013-06-12)
-----------------------------------------
- renamed XMLDom::iterator to XMLDom::sibling_iterator and added feature to iterate over siblings with the same name
- remove var tag from config file after parsing it
- XMLDom::sibling_iterator now only iterates over siblings that are element nodes (no comment or content nodes)
- added mira::console::getWidth() to obtain the width of the current terminal
- ProgramOptions now takes the width of the terminal into account when generating the help output
- added IncrementalMoments for incremental computation of 1D and higher dimensional statistical moments such as mean, variance, covariance, etc.
- added AbstractTransformerNode::getParent()
- renamed resolveTags() to preprocessXML() and moved function to XMLDomPreprocessor.h
- Fixed bug with Qt moc failing to parse BOOST_JOIN macro
- Fixed bug with lerp for RigidTransform2f returns wrong angle results

Version 0.20.1 (Release date: 2013-05-02)
-----------------------------------------
- made compile with gcc 4.8
- fixed tiny memory leak in IOService
- added findPackage and findPackages methods to find the root dir of installed package(s)
- added special variable 'findpkg PACKAGENAME' which is resolved using the findPackage method
- added 'select' attribute to include tag in xml files to allow including only a subtree of nodes from an xml file
- fixed binary2json converter for bool type #573

Version 0.20.0 (Release date: 2013-04-16)
-----------------------------------------
- added NoLock and MutexLock policy for Singleton classes, the instantiation
of singletons is now thread-safe per default
- PropertySerializer now supports the itemName() method in the reflect()
method to specify a user defined name for a collection item to be visualized
in the property editor
- json::Value is now serializable as atomic type
- JSONSerializer does no longer serialize json::Values as string representation
- added simple foreachIt macro
- fixed bug in JSONDeserializer when outer most serialized object has polymorphic class type
- fixed object tracking bug in RecursiveMemberReflector
- JSONDeserializer now shows much more helpful error messages
- fixed waiting for child process to terminate
- the resolveTags method now also evaluates the if_not, if_not_exists, assert, assert_not, assert_exists and assert_not_exists tags in XML config files
- fixed segfault in the boost::asio internals when network connection is disconnected

Version 0.19.0 (Release date: 2013-03-19)
-----------------------------------------
- XML serialization: atomic members like ints, floats, strings can now
optionally be specified as attributes instead of sub-nodes which makes XML
files more compact and better readable
- fixed bug in XML deserialization that led to misleading error messages #536

Version 0.18.0 (Release date: 2013-02-22)
-----------------------------------------
- pointer tracking is now enabled for keys of std::map and std::set if they are pointers or shared_ptr
- fixed detection of IsTransparentSerializable type trait for const types

Version 0.17.0 (Release date: 2013-02-14)
-----------------------------------------
- made random generators copyable
- added formulae based color maps (e.g. pm3d, rainbow)
- updated doc on PropertyHints::enumeration

Version 0.16.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- added NormalRandomGenerator to draw samples from uni- and multivariate normal distributions
- added RandomGenerator template to easily use the boost::random framework
- renamed the random singleton to RandomGeneratorSingleton
- XMLDomModifier now supports <if_exists env='name'> to check if environment variable is set
- XMLDomModifier now supports to overwrite variables via <var varname='value' overwrite='true'/>
- boost::tuple is no longer reflected as collection
- removed calls of deprecated boost asio methods
- fixed bug in binary serialization of boost::optional
- added ScopedAccess class
- fixed missing thread synchronization in Profiler
- added Spinlock class
- added StripedStorage class for storing data reliable
- added MetaSerializer and binary to JSON as well as JSON to binary converter based on meta information
- adapted to compile with boost 1.48 and newer
- added MIRA_PROFILE_SCOPE macro
- fixed #461,#463
- added remove method to XMLDom::data_iterator
- unified usage of boost::shared_ptr instead of std::shared_ptr
- removed boost patches for CLang compiler
- added support for getter and setter with lambda functions
- reduced compile times and made compile with latest compiler versions
- added callback mechanism to LogCore::setSeverityLevel that informs listeners when the user changed the log level
- added more detailed memory information for Linux; computation of memory stats is now done using smaps
- added HasAssign type trait to test whether a class has a certain assignment operator
- added IsDefaultConstructible type trait to check, if a class is default constructible
- PoolAllocator is no longer copyable but now supports move semantics
- refactored Stamped template class to reduce code duplication and to allow easy copying of the data header
- removed unnecessary vector alignment for 2D poses and added type trait for vector alignment of poses
- fixed bug with typename and long
- added choleskyInverse() for computing the inverse of self-adjoint matrices
- added MIRA_DEFINE_EXCEPTION macro for easy definition of new exception types
- fixed typeName for pointers on Win64 (MSVC x64 adds __ptr64 qualifier to pointers)
- fixed #511 (boost foreach problem with boost >= 1.48).
- fixed bug in covariance propagation of 2D RigidTransformCov

Version 0.15.0 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed bugs in RPC mechanism, that caused sporadic 'broken promise' exceptions
- added atomic (thread-safe) operations such as increment, decrement, etc.
- added implementsInterface in RPCServer and RPCManager to check if a service implements a certain interface
- fixed bug with filename in daily logging mechanism

Version 0.14.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- added some methods in namespace ImgPainter for drawing advanced stuff like covariance ellipses etc.
- added ${filePath} built-in variable to the XMLDom parser that contains the full path to the current xml file.
- added path of involved libraries for double class identifier exception
- ManifestGen can delete user defined file if the generation process fails
- SharedLibrary: now using RTLD_NOW instead of RTLD_LAZY. Therefore, all necessary libs must be linked at compile time now!

Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2012-08-16)
-----------------------------------------
- BinaryDeserializer: Added setter and getter for internal map for codecs.
- Profiler: fixed segfault at program termination
- added functions for computing powers with constant integral exponent or constant integral exponent and base
-made square() deprecated
- removed math/MetaPrograms.h whose content is now in math/Power.h

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2012-08-07)
-----------------------------------------
- added non-intrusive reflect for Date

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- XMLDom: added has_attribute() function to XML node iterators
- Profiler: added variance to average time and cycles
- updates and fixes in documentation
- added new LogFileSink with support for log file rotation and daily log files
- Fixed several issues in boost::asio::read_some in SyncTimedRead.h

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
-----------------------------------------
- Factory: fixed support of typedefs for template classes
- Path: added method for obtaining application data directory
- added new function hexdump
- fixed bug in ThreadMonitor
- added typedefs for double images
- Fixed numerical issues in computation of covariance matrix for special quaternions
- moved Velocity from RobotDataTypes package into the base
- added Eigen aligned vector typedefs Velocity2Vector and Velocity3Vector
- replaced Velocity class by typedefs to RigidTransform
- added SetterNotify, that simply sets the specified member to the given value and calls the provided notify callback method afterwards.
- renamed ColorPalette, etc. to Colormap and added some new colormaps
- added AES encryption and decryption based on boost::iostreams
- added support for serialization of cv::Point
- fixed Profiler measurement bug on 64bit linux platforms
- Img: split up assignment operator and assignment of a roi
- ProgramOptions: using vector of strings for storing command line parameters instead of argc and argv parameters
- Matrices are no longer reflected as string in JSON. They are now reflected as arrays of arrays.
- ReflectorInterface: reflector.method() now can also be used with boost::bind functions

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: MIRAenvironment
item.description: The environment of MIRA. This package contains all files anddirectories, which are necessary for MIRA. Furthermore, itcontains the cmake/make system for MIRA.
item.author: Christian Martin
item.changelog:
Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2012-08-07)
-----------------------------------------
- Bugfixes in source and binary installers

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- updates and fixes in documentation
- Bugfix in '${name}-zip' targets : Store symbolic links as the link instead of the referenced file

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
-----------------------------------------
- Implement strict separation between debug and release DLLs on windows
- Reworked building of binary installation packages (RPM and TAR).
- Fixed parallel build bug in mira-installer.sh for systems where Ogre is not already installed.
- Optional 2nd argument in MIRA_REQUIRE_PACKAGE is now interpreted as the required version (major and minor version must match).
- New MIRA_EXTERNAL_DIR macro defines the directory where to place external dependencies.
- Added support for building DEB files for Ubuntu
- Added support for building binary ZIPs for using with mirapackage

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.description: The environment of MIRA. This package contains all files anddirectories, which are necessary for MIRA. Furthermore, itcontains the cmake/make system for MIRA.
item.author: Christian Martin
item.changelog:
Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
-----------------------------------------
- Implement strict separation between debug and release DLLs on windows
- Reworked building of binary installation packages (RPM and TAR).
- Fixed parallel build bug in mira-installer.sh for systems where Ogre is not already installed.
- Optional 2nd argument in MIRA_REQUIRE_PACKAGE is now interpreted as the required version (major and minor version must match).
- New MIRA_EXTERNAL_DIR macro defines the directory where to place external dependencies.
- Added support for building DEB files for Ubuntu
- Added support for building binary ZIPs for using with mirapackage

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: MIRAenvironment
item.description: The environment of MIRA. This package contains all files anddirectories, which are necessary for MIRA. Furthermore, itcontains the cmake/make system for MIRA.
item.author: Christian Martin
item.changelog:
Version 0.16.6 (Release date: 2014-03-19)
-----------------------------------------
- added miraedit: a tool for editing a file within a package using a text editor
- added package GraphVisualization to install scripts

Version 0.16.5 (Release date: 2014-02-25)
-----------------------------------------
- increased robustness of findQwt by adding additional search directory
- Bugfix in installer scripts: Ask before delete an existing mirapackage configuration.
- Made bash completion to work, even if the script mirafindpkg is not marked executable

Version 0.16.4 (Release date: 2014-02-09)
-----------------------------------------
- miramk now creates build directories if they do not exist

Version 0.16.3 (Release date: 2014-01-14)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed bug which caused incomplete ZIP binary packages, if a package contains
multiple packages files.
- miracd autocompletion is now much faster
- Added miramk for invoking make on a certain package
- miracd, mirals, etc. now use the colon syntax to be consistent with the
syntax used config files, e.g. miracd MyPackage:some/path
- added miracp for copying files between packages
- reimplemented bash auto completion to allow the completion of packages, files and paths at the same time
- added support for multiple files to MIRA_INSTALL_FILES macro and renamed old MIRA_INSTALL_FILES macro to MIRA_INSTALL_FILE

Version 0.16.2 (Release date: 2013-11-15)
-----------------------------------------
- Added autocomplete functionality for bash

Version 0.16.1 (Release date: 2013-08-28)
-----------------------------------------
- the build system can now handle symlinks to the directories where the build is executed
- drastically reduced time for CMAKEs configure step

Version 0.16.0 (Release date: 2013-06-12)
-----------------------------------------
- Added scripts/mirabash to be included in the bashrc file for providing 'miracd', 'mirals' and 'mirapkgs'
commands that can be used to jump directly to a directory of a package.
- Made detection of boost libraries more robust by using the provided variables from Boost.
- prepared make system for Qt 5
- Added recursive collection of dependencies for binary installation packages.
- Added own macros for adding Qt translations to a binary or library.

Version 0.15.2 (Release date: 2013-04-16)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed path to images of the miracenter documentation

Version 0.15.1 (Release date: 2013-02-22)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed path to documentation of miracenter
- added new toolbox Localization to installation scripts
- MIRA_REQUIRE_PACKAGE: Fixed optional required version comparison

Version 0.15.0 (Release date: 2013-02-14)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed misleading error message in MIRA_REQUIRE_PACKAGE
- fixed invalid zip file creation for package 'external'
- Building ZIP packages: Reduced dependencies for binary packages to major and minor version number.

Version 0.14.2 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- satisfy CMake policy CMP00012 where IF() only recognizes numbers and boolean constants.
- slightly updated compiler flags
- added relwithdebinfo target to create release builds with debug information
- unified names of Boost libraries
- added support for building on Windows 64 bit
- added support for using a installed binary version of OpenCV by using the environment variable OPENCV_HOME

Version 0.14.1 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- Linux, 64bit: Try to use libiberty_pic first (instead of for libiberty), since libiberty might be compiled without -fPIC.
- Detection of OpenCV: added support OpenCV_USE_MANGLED_PATHS=ON
- Bugfix in installer scripts: Ensure, that MIRA_PATH is set right in all stages.
- Made building of ZIP packages to work on Windows

Version 0.14.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- Removed tests and examples from debug and release target and introduced new targets
- If the generation of a manifest file fails, the associated library will be deleted. Therefore linking and generation of manifest file will be done over and over if build is triggered.
- Added optional argument MANIFEST_IGNORE_CLASSES to MIRA_ADD_LIBRARY, which allows to exclude the specified class names from the manifest file.

Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2012-08-16)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed CMAKE_FIND_LIBRARY_SUFFIXES in Prerequisites.cmake: Now shared libraries are preferred by default.

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2012-08-07)
-----------------------------------------
- Bugfixes in source and binary installers

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- updates and fixes in documentation
- Bugfix in '${name}-zip' targets : Store symbolic links as the link instead of the referenced file

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
-----------------------------------------
- Implement strict separation between debug and release DLLs on windows
- Reworked building of binary installation packages (RPM and TAR).
- Fixed parallel build bug in mira-installer.sh for systems where Ogre is not already installed.
- Optional 2nd argument in MIRA_REQUIRE_PACKAGE is now interpreted as the required version (major and minor version must match).
- New MIRA_EXTERNAL_DIR macro defines the directory where to place external dependencies.
- Added support for building DEB files for Ubuntu
- Added support for building binary ZIPs for using with mirapackage

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

- Added optional argument MANIFEST_IGNORE_CLASSES to MIRA_ADD_LIBRARY, which allows to exclude the specified class names from the manifest file.

Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2012-08-16)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed CMAKE_FIND_LIBRARY_SUFFIXES in Prerequisites.cmake: Now shared libraries are preferred by default.

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2012-08-07)
-----------------------------------------
- Bugfixes in source and binary installers

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- updates and fixes in documentation
- Bugfix in '${name}-zip' targets : Store symbolic links as the link instead of the referenced file

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
-----------------------------------------
- Implement strict separation between debug and release DLLs on windows
- Reworked building of binary installation packages (RPM and TAR).
- Fixed parallel build bug in mira-installer.sh for systems where Ogre is not already installed.
- Optional 2nd argument in MIRA_REQUIRE_PACKAGE is now interpreted as the required version (major and minor version must match).
- New MIRA_EXTERNAL_DIR macro defines the directory where to place external dependencies.
- Added support for building DEB files for Ubuntu
- Added support for building binary ZIPs for using with mirapackage

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: MIRAenvironment
item.description: The environment of MIRA. This package contains all files anddirectories, which are necessary for MIRA. Furthermore, itcontains the cmake/make system for MIRA.
item.author: Christian Martin
item.changelog:
Version 0.16.5 (Release date: 2014-02-25)
-----------------------------------------
- increased robustness of findQwt by adding additional search directory
- Bugfix in installer scripts: Ask before delete an existing mirapackage configuration.
- Made bash completion to work, even if the script mirafindpkg is not marked executable

Version 0.16.4 (Release date: 2014-02-09)
-----------------------------------------
- miramk now creates build directories if they do not exist

Version 0.16.3 (Release date: 2014-01-14)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed bug which caused incomplete ZIP binary packages, if a package contains
multiple packages files.
- miracd autocompletion is now much faster
- Added miramk for invoking make on a certain package
- miracd, mirals, etc. now use the colon syntax to be consistent with the
syntax used config files, e.g. miracd MyPackage:some/path
- added miracp for copying files between packages
- reimplemented bash auto completion to allow the completion of packages, files and paths at the same time
- added support for multiple files to MIRA_INSTALL_FILES macro and renamed old MIRA_INSTALL_FILES macro to MIRA_INSTALL_FILE

-----------------------------------------
- Added autocomplete functionality for bash

- the build system can now handle symlinks to the directories where the build is executed

item.description: The environment of MIRA. This package contains all files anddirectories, which are necessary for MIRA. Furthermore, itcontains the cmake/make system for MIRA.
item.author: Christian Martin
item.changelog:
Version 0.15.2 (Release date: 2013-04-16)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed path to images of the miracenter documentation

Version 0.15.1 (Release date: 2013-02-22)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed path to documentation of miracenter
- added new toolbox Localization to installation scripts
- MIRA_REQUIRE_PACKAGE: Fixed optional required version comparison

Version 0.15.0 (Release date: 2013-02-14)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed misleading error message in MIRA_REQUIRE_PACKAGE
- fixed invalid zip file creation for package 'external'
- Building ZIP packages: Reduced dependencies for binary packages to major and minor version number.

Version 0.14.2 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- satisfy CMake policy CMP00012 where IF() only recognizes numbers and boolean constants.
- slightly updated compiler flags
- added relwithdebinfo target to create release builds with debug information
- unified names of Boost libraries
- added support for building on Windows 64 bit
- added support for using a installed binary version of OpenCV by using the environment variable OPENCV_HOME

Version 0.14.1 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- Linux, 64bit: Try to use libiberty_pic first (instead of for libiberty), since libiberty might be compiled without -fPIC.
- Detection of OpenCV: added support OpenCV_USE_MANGLED_PATHS=ON
- Bugfix in installer scripts: Ensure, that MIRA_PATH is set right in all stages.
- Made building of ZIP packages to work on Windows

Version 0.14.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- Removed tests and examples from debug and release target and introduced new targets
- If the generation of a manifest file fails, the associated library will be deleted. Therefore linking and generation of manifest file will be done over and over if build is triggered.
- Added optional argument MANIFEST_IGNORE_CLASSES to MIRA_ADD_LIBRARY, which allows to exclude the specified class names from the manifest file.

Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2012-08-16)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed CMAKE_FIND_LIBRARY_SUFFIXES in Prerequisites.cmake: Now shared libraries are preferred by default.

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2012-08-07)
-----------------------------------------
- Bugfixes in source and binary installers

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- updates and fixes in documentation
- Bugfix in '${name}-zip' targets : Store symbolic links as the link instead of the referenced file

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
-----------------------------------------
- Implement strict separation between debug and release DLLs on windows
- Reworked building of binary installation packages (RPM and TAR).
- Fixed parallel build bug in mira-installer.sh for systems where Ogre is not already installed.
- Optional 2nd argument in MIRA_REQUIRE_PACKAGE is now interpreted as the required version (major and minor version must match).
- New MIRA_EXTERNAL_DIR macro defines the directory where to place external dependencies.
- Added support for building DEB files for Ubuntu
- Added support for building binary ZIPs for using with mirapackage

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: MIRAenvironment

item.author: Christian Martin
item.changelog:
Version 0.16.1 (Release date: 2013-08-28)
-----------------------------------------
- the build system can now handle symlinks to the directories where the build is executed
- drastically reduced time for CMAKEs configure step

Version 0.16.0 (Release date: 2013-06-12)
-----------------------------------------
- Added scripts/mirabash to be included in the bashrc file for providing 'miracd', 'mirals' and 'mirapkgs'
commands that can be used to jump directly to a directory of a package.
- Made detection of boost libraries more robust by using the provided variables from Boost.
- prepared make system for Qt 5
- Added recursive collection of dependencies for binary installation packages.
- Added own macros for adding Qt translations to a binary or library.

item.name: MIRAenvironment
item.description: The environment of MIRA. This package contains all files anddirectories, which are necessary for MIRA. Furthermore, itcontains the cmake/make system for MIRA.
item.author: Christian Martin
item.changelog:
Version 0.16.8 (Release date: 2014-07-20)
-----------------------------------------
- miramk does no longer try to build packages without CMakeLists.txt
- find libiberty on platforms where the header is located in the libiberty subdirectory

Version 0.16.7 (Release date: 2014-04-15)
-----------------------------------------
- added support for VERBOSE flag if make is triggered from source tree

Version 0.16.6 (Release date: 2014-03-19)
-----------------------------------------
- added miraedit: a tool for editing a file within a package using a text editor
- added package GraphVisualization to install scripts

Version 0.16.5 (Release date: 2014-02-25)
-----------------------------------------
- increased robustness of findQwt by adding additional search directory
- Bugfix in installer scripts: Ask before delete an existing mirapackage configuration.
- Made bash completion to work, even if the script mirafindpkg is not marked executable

Version 0.16.4 (Release date: 2014-02-09)
-----------------------------------------
- miramk now creates build directories if they do not exist

Version 0.16.3 (Release date: 2014-01-14)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed bug which caused incomplete ZIP binary packages, if a package contains
multiple packages files.
- miracd autocompletion is now much faster
- Added miramk for invoking make on a certain package
- miracd, mirals, etc. now use the colon syntax to be consistent with the
syntax used config files, e.g. miracd MyPackage:some/path
- added miracp for copying files between packages
- reimplemented bash auto completion to allow the completion of packages, files and paths at the same time
- added support for multiple files to MIRA_INSTALL_FILES macro and renamed old MIRA_INSTALL_FILES macro to MIRA_INSTALL_FILE

Version 0.16.2 (Release date: 2013-11-15)
-----------------------------------------
- Added autocomplete functionality for bash

Version 0.16.1 (Release date: 2013-08-28)
-----------------------------------------
- the build system can now handle symlinks to the directories where the build is executed
- drastically reduced time for CMAKEs configure step

Version 0.16.0 (Release date: 2013-06-12)
-----------------------------------------

- Building ZIP packages: Reduced dependencies for binary packages to major and minor version number.

Version 0.14.2 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- satisfy CMake policy CMP00012 where IF() only recognizes numbers and boolean constants.
- slightly updated compiler flags
- added relwithdebinfo target to create release builds with debug information
- unified names of Boost libraries
- added support for building on Windows 64 bit
- added support for using a installed binary version of OpenCV by using the environment variable OPENCV_HOME

item.name: MIRAPackage
item.description: The MIRA package manager.
item.author: Ronny Stricker;Christian Martin
item.changelog:
Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- Added support for repositories on a local file system
- Bugfix in dependency checks
- Fixed order of packages in install preview dialog
- Restore GUI state at start of mirapackage
- Fixed sort order of the version column in the package list

Version 0.12.1 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed wrong counting of recursion level during dependency resolving
- Restructured install overview dialog

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2012-08-07)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed creation of symlinks in binary packages

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- DependencyDialog no longer throws if dependencies (which will not be installed) cannot be fulfilled
- added new export dialog to select packages which should be exported
- removed default repositories

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
-----------------------------------------
- added new developement state: Deprecated
- use full subpath from mountdir to package file during checkout
- fixed: restore dependency flags in dependency view so thate runtime/optionals dependencies are displayed the right way
- respositories associated with a package can be displayed in the package list by right clicking on the list view header
- using application data directory for configuration files
- added export and import of repositories
- introduced generic repositories to enable uninstall of packages which are no longer associated with one of the known repositories
- mirapackage now checks if versions of packages are binary compatible (if major and minor version are equal)
- using new macro MIRA_EXTERNAL_DIR for installing quazip
- added support installing binary ZIP files
- added support for checking dependencies based on MIRA_BUILD_ID

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: MIRAPackage
item.description: The MIRA package manager.
item.author: Ronny Stricker;Christian Martin
item.changelog:
Version 0.14.0 (Release date: 2012-11-01)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed critical bug in InstallOverviewDialog, which caused a mess when (un-)installing multiple packages
- More detailed error messages for errors during uninstall operations.
- Sorted available alternative versions in combo box in package description widget
- Install updated packages in the old location by default (independent of the selected MIRA_PATH).
- If an error occurs during the installation, revert everything we did in this installation step.
- Don't show error messages about files or directories which can not delete anymore.

Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- Added support for repositories on a local file system
- Bugfix in dependency checks
- Fixed order of packages in install preview dialog
- Restore GUI state at start of mirapackage
- Fixed sort order of the version column in the package list

Version 0.12.1 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed wrong counting of recursion level during dependency resolving
- Restructured install overview dialog

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2012-08-07)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed creation of symlinks in binary packages

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- DependencyDialog no longer throws if dependencies (which will not be installed) cannot be fulfilled
- added new export dialog to select packages which should be exported
- removed default repositories

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
-----------------------------------------
- added new developement state: Deprecated
- use full subpath from mountdir to package file during checkout
- fixed: restore dependency flags in dependency view so thate runtime/optionals dependencies are displayed the right way
- respositories associated with a package can be displayed in the package list by right clicking on the list view header
- using application data directory for configuration files
- added export and import of repositories
- introduced generic repositories to enable uninstall of packages which are no longer associated with one of the known repositories
- mirapackage now checks if versions of packages are binary compatible (if major and minor version are equal)
- using new macro MIRA_EXTERNAL_DIR for installing quazip
- added support installing binary ZIP files
- added support for checking dependencies based on MIRA_BUILD_ID

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

- Added support for repositories on a local file system
- Bugfix in dependency checks
- Fixed order of packages in install preview dialog
- Restore GUI state at start of mirapackage
- Fixed sort order of the version column in the package list

Version 0.12.1 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed wrong counting of recursion level during dependency resolving
- Restructured install overview dialog

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2012-08-07)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed creation of symlinks in binary packages

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- DependencyDialog no longer throws if dependencies (which will not be installed) cannot be fulfilled
- added new export dialog to select packages which should be exported
- removed default repositories

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
-----------------------------------------
- added new development state: Deprecated
- use full subpath from mountdir to package file during checkout
- fixed: restore dependency flags in dependency view so thate runtime/optionals dependencies are displayed the right way
- respositories associated with a package can be displayed in the package list by right clicking on the list view header
- using application data directory for configuration files
- added export and import of repositories
- introduced generic repositories to enable uninstall of packages which are no longer associated with one of the known repositories
- mirapackage now checks if versions of packages are binary compatible (if major and minor version are equal)
- using new macro MIRA_EXTERNAL_DIR for installing quazip
- added support installing binary ZIP files
- added support for checking dependencies based on MIRA_BUILD_ID

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: MIRACenter
item.description: The 'miracenter' launches a MIRA framework using aconfiguration file and allows visualization of data,debugging, etc. The MIRA Center is based on theRich Client Platform (RCP).
item.author: Erik Einhorn;Tim Langner
item.changelog:
Version 0.15.5 (Release date: 2014-01-20)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed BillboardSphere material for cg shaders

Version 0.15.4 (Release date: 2013-11-18)
-----------------------------------------
- Channel updates and update rate is now shown in tooltip when hovering over the
channel in the channel view
- Updated keyboard shortcut list

Version 0.15.3 (Release date: 2013-11-18)
-----------------------------------------
- Added missing autocomplete.bash to binary package

Version 0.15.2 (Release date: 2013-11-15)
-----------------------------------------
- disable splash screen if help argument is given on command line
- Added autocomplete functionality for bash
- When closing miracenter the workspace is only saved if AutoSaveWorkspace is enabled

Version 0.15.1 (Release date: 2013-08-28)
-----------------------------------------
- now showing network throughput (in and outgoing) in status bar
- AuthorityView: View shows updates of single Authorities more contemporary
- AuthorityView: now using AuthorityManager::getAuthority in update thread to avoid locking mutex in AuthorityManager for a long time
- adapted to changes in TapeRecorderWidget
- added expand/collapse button to authority view, channel view and property view

Version 0.15.0 (Release date: 2013-06-12)
-----------------------------------------
- made CaptureView authority hidden
- Profiler is now triggered using the --enable-profiler command line option
- added --no-splash option to disable splash screen
- removed cmake code for backward compatibility to 0.12.0
- added TransformTreeTextView

Version 0.14.1 (Release date: 2013-04-16)
-----------------------------------------
- Minor changes on some views
- Added --fontsize option to set a reduced font size for small screens

Version 0.14.0 (Release date: 2013-03-19)
-----------------------------------------
- CaptureView now supports capturing to channel and to video file using VideoOutput plugins

Version 0.13.1 (Release date: 2013-02-22)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: fixed another crash when removing published or subscribed channels

Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2013-02-14)
-----------------------------------------
- Moved TapePlayerWidget and TapeRecorderWidget to GUIFramework
- Integrated TapePlayer and TapeRecorder
- AuthorityView: fixed color code for subscribed channels in FrameworkStatusView to match the ones used
- AuthorityView: fixed crash when removing published or subscribed channels

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- LogView: Application-wide log level can now be changed
- LogView: Displayed time is now in local time zone
- AuthorityView: fixed unhandeled exceptions that led to an abnormal program termination when the connections to remote frameworks were closed
- AuthorityView: added Button for generating documentation of units
- AuthorityView: fixed update of start/stop button
- Show MIRACenter specific command line options when using --help
- Added command line option --default-workspace
- Removed visualization of virtual memory in the status bar. On Linux: displaying the amount of heap memory now
- Added Memory Monitor View that shows all memory blocks used by the process and allows to trace the origin of pointers (Linux only)
- Increased performance of Thread Monitor and fixed sorting bug
- Ported Billboard shaders to GLSL to support systems without Ogre-Cg plugin
- CaptureView now supports several image formats

Version 0.11.1 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: now showing informations about published and subscribed channels

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- added RPC console which is now part of the default perspective
- improved fullscreen mode
- added Help menu
- added default location for most views
- added Framework Graph Status display for better debugging
- AuthorityView: Handle internal errors (e.g. incompatible/older version).

Version 0.10.1 (Release date: 2012-08-07)
-----------------------------------------
- Bugfix: Ensure, that the framework and all units are stopped before profiler report is written and Exit-message is shown
- More documentation on the tools of the 3D view

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: Reduced GUI delays when connected to a remote framework

Version 0.9.1 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
----------------------------------------
- Fixed: Made autosave working again
- Removed 'static mode' and prepared 'locking' of workspaces instead
- New: Channels can now also be dropped on the background of the MDI area. The corresponding visualization view will be created automatically.
- Removed 3D view from default perspectives
- Fixed crash in RPC view when service/method was empty

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

- Bugfix: Ensure, that the framework and all units are stopped before profiler report is written and Exit-message is shown
- More documentation on the tools of the 3D view

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: Reduced GUI delays when connected to a remote framework

Version 0.9.1 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
----------------------------------------
- Fixed: Made autosave working again
- Removed 'static mode' and prepared 'locking' of workspaces instead
- New: Channels can now also be dropped on the background of the MDI area. The corresponding visualization view will be created automatically.
- Removed 3D view from default perspectives
- Fixed crash in RPC view when service/method was empty

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: MIRACenter
item.description: The 'miracenter' launches a MIRA framework using aconfiguration file and allows visualization of data,debugging, etc. The MIRA Center is based on theRich Client Platform (RCP).
item.author: Erik Einhorn;Tim Langner
item.changelog:
Version 0.14.1 (Release date: 2013-04-16)
-----------------------------------------
- Minor changes on some views
- Added --fontsize option to set a reduced font size for small screens

Version 0.14.0 (Release date: 2013-03-19)
-----------------------------------------
- CaptureView now supports capturing to channel and to video file using VideoOutput plugins

Version 0.13.1 (Release date: 2013-02-22)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: fixed another crash when removing published or subscribed channels

Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2013-02-14)
-----------------------------------------
- Moved TapePlayerWidget and TapeRecorderWidget to GUIFramework
- Integrated TapePlayer and TapeRecorder
- AuthorityView: fixed color code for subscribed channels in FrameworkStatusView to match the ones used
- AuthorityView: fixed crash when removing published or subscribed channels

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- LogView: Application-wide log level can now be changed
- LogView: Displayed time is now in local time zone
- AuthorityView: fixed unhandeled exceptions that led to an abnormal program termination when the connections to remote frameworks were closed
- AuthorityView: added Button for generating documentation of units
- AuthorityView: fixed update of start/stop button
- Show MIRACenter specific command line options when using --help
- Added command line option --default-workspace
- Removed visualization of virtual memory in the status bar. On Linux: displaying the amount of heap memory now
- Added Memory Monitor View that shows all memory blocks used by the process and allows to trace the origin of pointers (Linux only)
- Increased performance of Thread Monitor and fixed sorting bug
- Ported Billboard shaders to GLSL to support systems without Ogre-Cg plugin
- CaptureView now supports several image formats

Version 0.11.1 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: now showing informations about published and subscribed channels

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- added RPC console which is now part of the default perspective
- improved fullscreen mode
- added Help menu
- added default location for most views
- added Framework Graph Status display for better debugging
- AuthorityView: Handle internal errors (e.g. incompatible/older version).

Version 0.10.1 (Release date: 2012-08-07)
-----------------------------------------
- Bugfix: Ensure, that the framework and all units are stopped before profiler report is written and Exit-message is shown
- More documentation on the tools of the 3D view

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: Reduced GUI delays when connected to a remote framework

Version 0.9.1 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
----------------------------------------
- Fixed: Made autosave working again
- Removed 'static mode' and prepared 'locking' of workspaces instead
- New: Channels can now also be dropped on the background of the MDI area. The corresponding visualization view will be created automatically.
- Removed 3D view from default perspectives
- Fixed crash in RPC view when service/method was empty

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.author: Erik Einhorn;Tim Langner

item.name: MIRACenter
item.description: The 'miracenter' launches a MIRA framework using aconfiguration file and allows visualization of data,debugging, etc. The MIRA Center is based on theRich Client Platform (RCP).
item.author: Erik Einhorn;Tim Langner
item.changelog:
Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- added RPC console which is now part of the default perspective
- improved fullscreen mode
- added Help menu
- added default location for most views
- added Framework Graph Status display for better debugging
- AuthorityView: Handle internal errors (e.g. incompatible/older version).

Version 0.10.1 (Release date: 2012-08-07)
-----------------------------------------
- Bugfix: Ensure, that the framework and all units are stopped before profiler report is written and Exit-message is shown
- More documentation on the tools of the 3D view

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: Reduced GUI delays when connected to a remote framework

Version 0.9.1 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
----------------------------------------
- Fixed: Made autosave working again
- Removed
"
Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25

item.name: MIRACenter
item.description: The 'miracenter' launches a MIRA framework using aconfiguration file and allows visualization of data,debugging, etc. The MIRA Center is based on theRich Client Platform (RCP).
item.author: Erik Einhorn;Tim Langner
item.changelog:
Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- LogView: Application-wide log level can now be changed
- LogView: Displayed time is now in local time zone
- AuthorityView: fixed unhandeled exceptions that led to an abnormal program termination when the connections to remote frameworks were closed
- AuthorityView: added Button for generating documentation of units
- AuthorityView: fixed update of start/stop button
- Show MIRACenter specific command line options when using --help
- Added command line option --default-workspace
- Removed visualization of virtual memory in the status bar. On Linux: displaying the amount of heap memory now
- Added Memory Monitor View that shows all memory blocks used by the process and allows to trace the origin of pointers (Linux only)
- Increased performance of Thread Monitor and fixed sorting bug
- Ported Billboard shaders to GLSL to support systems without Ogre-Cg plugin
- CaptureView now supports several image formats

Version 0.11.1 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: now showing informations about published and subscribed channels

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- added RPC console which is now part of the default perspective
- improved fullscreen mode
- added Help menu
- added default location for most views
- added Framework Graph Status display for better debugging
- AuthorityView: Handle internal errors (e.g. incompatible/older version).

Version 0.10.1 (Release date: 2012-08-07)
-----------------------------------------
- Bugfix: Ensure, that the framework and all units are stopped before profiler report is written and Exit-message is shown
- More documentation on the tools of the 3D view

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: Reduced GUI delays when connected to a remote framework

Version 0.9.1 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
----------------------------------------
- Fixed: Made autosave working again
- Removed 'static mode' and prepared 'locking' of workspaces instead
- New: Channels can now also be dropped on the background of the MDI area. The corresponding visualization view will be created automatically.
- Removed 3D view from default perspectives
- Fixed crash in RPC view when service/method was empty

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: MIRACenter
item.description: The 'miracenter' launches a MIRA framework using aconfiguration file and allows visualization of data,debugging, etc. The MIRA Center is based on theRich Client Platform (RCP).
item.author: Erik Einhorn;Tim Langner
item.changelog:
Version 0.15.1 (Release date: 2013-08-28)
-----------------------------------------
- now showing network throughput (in and outgoing) in status bar
- AuthorityView: View shows updates of single Authorities more contemporary
- AuthorityView: now using AuthorityManager::getAuthority in update thread to avoid locking mutex in AuthorityManager for a long time
- adapted to changes in TapeRecorderWidget
- added expand/collapse button to authority view, channel view and property view

Version 0.15.0 (Release date: 2013-06-12)
-----------------------------------------
- made CaptureView authority hidden
- Profiler is now triggered using the --enable-profiler command line option
- added --no-splash option to disable splash screen
- removed cmake code for backward compatibility to 0.12.0
- added TransformTreeTextView

Version 0.14.1 (Release date: 2013-04-16)
-----------------------------------------
- Minor changes on some views
- Added --fontsize option to set a reduced font size for small screens

Version 0.14.0 (Release date: 2013-03-19)
-----------------------------------------
- CaptureView now supports capturing to channel and to video file using VideoOutput plugins

Version 0.13.1 (Release date: 2013-02-22)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: fixed another crash when removing published or subscribed channels

Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2013-02-14)
-----------------------------------------
- Moved TapePlayerWidget and TapeRecorderWidget to GUIFramework
- Integrated TapePlayer and TapeRecorder
- AuthorityView: fixed color code for subscribed channels in FrameworkStatusView to match the ones used
- AuthorityView: fixed crash when removing published or subscribed channels

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- LogView: Application-wide log level can now be changed
- LogView: Displayed time is now in local time zone
- AuthorityView: fixed unhandeled exceptions that led to an abnormal program termination when the connections to remote frameworks were closed
- AuthorityView: added Button for generating documentation of units
- AuthorityView: fixed update of start/stop button
- Show MIRACenter specific command line options when using --help
- Added command line option --default-workspace
- Removed visualization of virtual memory in the status bar. On Linux: displaying the amount of heap memory now
- Added Memory Monitor View that shows all memory blocks used by the process and allows to trace the origin of pointers (Linux only)
- Increased performance of Thread Monitor and fixed sorting bug
- Ported Billboard shaders to GLSL to support systems without Ogre-Cg plugin
- CaptureView now supports several image formats

Version 0.11.1 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: now showing informations about published and subscribed channels

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- added RPC console which is now part of the default perspective
- improved fullscreen mode
- added Help menu
- added default location for most views
- added Framework Graph Status display for better debugging
- AuthorityView: Handle internal errors (e.g. incompatible/older version).

Version 0.10.1 (Release date: 2012-08-07)
-----------------------------------------
- Bugfix: Ensure, that the framework and all units are stopped before profiler report is written and Exit-message is shown
- More documentation on the tools of the 3D view

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: Reduced GUI delays when connected to a remote framework

Version 0.9.1 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
----------------------------------------
- Fixed: Made autosave working again
- Removed 'static mode' and prepared 'locking' of workspaces instead
- New: Channels can now also be dropped on the background of the MDI area. The corresponding visualization view will be created automatically.
- Removed 3D view from default perspectives
- Fixed crash in RPC view when service/method was empty

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: MIRACenter
item.description: The 'miracenter' launches a MIRA framework using aconfiguration file and allows visualization of data,debugging, etc. The MIRA Center is based on theRich Client Platform (RCP).
item.author: Erik Einhorn;Tim Langner
item.changelog:
Version 0.16.1 (Release date: 2014-04-15)
-----------------------------------------
- the RPC console can now run script/batch files

Version 0.16.0 (Release date: 2014-03-19)
-----------------------------------------
- minor improvements in FrameworkGraphView
- moved FrameworkGraphView components to toolbox GraphVisualization

Version 0.15.6 (Release date: 2014-02-25)
-----------------------------------------
- Reimplemented FrameworkGraphView which can now handle large graphs in complex
applications
- using static and bug fixed method StatusManager::getOverallStatus instead of local one

Version 0.15.5 (Release date: 2014-01-20)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed BillboardSphere material for cg shaders

Version 0.15.4 (Release date: 2013-11-18)
-----------------------------------------
- Channel updates and update rate is now shown in tooltip when hovering over the
channel in the channel view
- Updated keyboard shortcut list

Version 0.15.3 (Release date: 2013-11-18)
-----------------------------------------
- Added missing autocomplete.bash to binary package

Version 0.15.2 (Release date: 2013-11-15)
-----------------------------------------
- disable splash screen if help argument is given on command line
- Added autocomplete functionality for bash
- When closing miracenter the workspace is only saved if AutoSaveWorkspace is enabled

Version 0.15.1 (Release date: 2013-08-28)
-----------------------------------------
- now showing network throughput (in and outgoing) in status bar
- AuthorityView: View shows updates of single Authorities more contemporary
- AuthorityView: now using AuthorityManager::getAuthority in update thread to avoid locking mutex in AuthorityManager for a long time
- adapted to changes in TapeRecorderWidget
- added expand/collapse button to authority view, channel view and property view

Version 0.15.0 (Release date: 2013-06-12)
-----------------------------------------
- made CaptureView authority hidden
- Profiler is now triggered using the --enable-profiler command line option
- added --no-splash option to disable splash screen
- removed cmake code for backward compatibility to 0.12.0
- added TransformTreeTextView

Version 0.14.1 (Release date: 2013-04-16)
-----------------------------------------
- Minor changes on some views
- Added --fontsize option to set a reduced font size for small screens

Version 0.14.0 (Release date: 2013-03-19)
-----------------------------------------

Version 0.13.1 (Release date: 2013-02-22)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: fixed another crash when removing published or subscribed channels

Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2013-02-14)
-----------------------------------------
- Moved TapePlayerWidget and TapeRecorderWidget to GUIFramework
- Integrated TapePlayer and TapeRecorder
- AuthorityView: fixed color code for subscribed channels in FrameworkStatusView to match the ones used
- AuthorityView: fixed crash when removing published or subscribed channels

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- LogView: Application-wide log level can now be changed
- LogView: Displayed time is now in local time zone
- AuthorityView: fixed unhandeled exceptions that led to an abnormal program termination when the connections to remote frameworks were closed
- AuthorityView: added Button for generating documentation of units
- AuthorityView: fixed update of start/stop button
- Show MIRACenter specific command line options when using --help
- Added command line option --default-workspace
- Removed visualization of virtual memory in the status bar. On Linux: displaying the amount of heap memory now
- Added Memory Monitor View that shows all memory blocks used by the process and allows to trace the origin of pointers (Linux only)
- Increased performance of Thread Monitor and fixed sorting bug
- Ported Billboard shaders to GLSL to support systems without Ogre-Cg plugin
- CaptureView now supports several image formats

Version 0.11.1 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: now showing informations about published and subscribed channels

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- added RPC console which is now part of the default perspective
- improved fullscreen mode
- added Help menu
- added default location for most views
- added Framework Graph Status display for better debugging
- AuthorityView: Handle internal errors (e.g. incompatible/older version).

Version 0.10.1 (Release date: 2012-08-07)
-----------------------------------------
- Bugfix: Ensure, that the framework and all units are stopped before profiler report is written and Exit-message is shown
- More documentation on the tools of the 3D view

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- AuthorityView: Reduced GUI delays when connected to a remote framework

Version 0.9.1 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
----------------------------------------
- Fixed: Made autosave working again
- Removed 'static mode' and prepared 'locking' of workspaces instead
- New: Channels can now also be dropped on the background of the MDI area. The corresponding visualization view will be created automatically.
- Removed 3D view from default perspectives
- Fixed crash in RPC view when service/method was empty

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: TapePlayer
item.description: For backward compatibility this package is a place holder for the TapePlayer which is now part of MIRACenter
item.author: Tim Langner
item.changelog:
Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2013-02-14)
-----------------------------------------
- Integrated TapePlayer into miracenter
- Removed dummy channel
- Fixed bug with (re)storing last played tape

Version 0.10.1 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed memory leak
- Added namespace prefix parameter when loading tapes
- Added pause control mode, that allows to specify a channel that controls whether the player is in pause mode or playing
- Show error message when play back of a tape leads to an error

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- Added default location for TapePlayer view
- Added menu for loop playback mode to specify number of loops

Version 0.9.1 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
----------------------------------------
- TapePlayerWidget now shows time without the time 'prefix' for values whose time stamp is before the start of the actual tape recording time
- Fixed speed slider and mapped slider positions to more useful speed values.

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

Version 0.9.1 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
----------------------------------------
- TapePlayerWidget now shows time without the time 'prefix' for values whose time stamp is before the start of the actual tape recording time
- Fixed speed slider and mapped slider positions to more useful speed values.

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: MIRAtape
item.description: A tool for recording, playing and manipulating aMIRA tape file.
item.author: Tim Langner;Erik Einhorn
item.changelog:
Version 0.14.6 (Release date: 2014-07-20)
-----------------------------------------
- added '--channels_not' option for play, copy, writeJSON (select only the channels to be ignored)
- fixed merge command to keep the compression of channels

Version 0.14.5 (Release date: 2014-04-15)
-----------------------------------------
- added --recordingtime option for the copy command

Version 0.14.4 (Release date: 2014-02-25)
-----------------------------------------
- now printing size information about channels (total and average message size)

Version 0.14.3 (Release date: 2014-02-09)
-----------------------------------------
- added command line option to write tape files with JSON syntax (dead useful for matlab import e.g. using jsonlab toolbox)

Version 0.14.2 (Release date: 2014-01-14)
-----------------------------------------
- now using printProgressBar from MIRABase
- implemented the transcode command for changing the codec of compressed data

Version 0.14.1 (Release date: 2013-11-15)
-----------------------------------------
- added the --use_original_timestamp option to the play command

Version 0.14.0 (Release date: 2013-08-28)
-----------------------------------------
- adapted to changes in channel API

Version 0.13.2 (Release date: 2013-06-12)
-----------------------------------------
- play by default plays also messages with negative time offset

Version 0.13.1 (Release date: 2013-04-16)
-----------------------------------------
- show time of recording in local timezone of the recording machine (time at place of recording)

Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2013-02-14)
-----------------------------------------
- moved VideoOutputPlugin base class to separate toolbox
- added option for changing typenames in tapes (removes meta data informations for this channel)

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- Made play option work again
- Adapted to changes in Tape (store meta information of channel type in tape)
- removed retype option from copy since it is no longer supported
- info shows time of recording in local time
- play now supports option to close miratape when play back is finished
- added extractVideo with support for video output plugins

Version 0.11.2 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- Added option for merging tape files

Version 0.11.1 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- made help text readable
- Option 'extractimages': Added check if image output directory exists.

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-08-16)
-----------------------------------------
- 'compress option' can now be used without specifying channels to compress all

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- Added repair functionality for tape files
- updates and fixes in documentation

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: RobotDataTypes
item.description: Basic datatypes (e.g. Odometry, RangeScans, RobotModels) andviews (e.g. DriveView) that are related to robots.
item.author: Tim Langner;Erik Einhorn
item.changelog:
Version 0.15.2 (Release date: 2013-03-19)
-----------------------------------------
- additional visualization mode (cones) for range scan visualization

Version 0.15.1 (Release date: 2013-02-22)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed differential motion model for backward motion

Version 0.15.0 (Release date: 2013-02-14)
-----------------------------------------
- added UnicycleBaseRobotModel as base class for all robot models that use translational and rotational velocities
- added ProbabilisticMotionModel as base class for all probabilistic motion models
- added acceleration and deceleration parameters for rotation and translation
- added class OdometryCorrectionDifferentialDrive

Version 0.14.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- moved the methods for computing the probabilistic motion model to a separate class: DifferentialProbabilisticMotionModel
- added a Gaussian motion model, that represents the probability using a normal distribution
- fixed DifferentialRobotModel::localKinematics: the computation was imprecise when driving right-hand corners

Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- split IDrive interface into IDrive and IMotorController
- adapted DriveView to IDrive and IMotorController

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed eigen alignment of odometry data

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
-----------------------------------------
- added method IDrive::enableMotors

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
-----------------------------------------
- moved Velocity classes to base and removed visualizations for Velocity
- fixed robot motion model for very motion steps
- added method IDrive::emergencyStop

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: RigidModel
item.description: Geometric (collision test) and visual representation of rigid models and markers.
item.author: Tim Langner
item.changelog:
Version 0.15.0 (Release date: 2014-07-20)
-----------------------------------------
- RigidModel: added support for multiple collision representations per link
- RigidModel: added name parameter for visual and collision representation
- RigidModel: added filter for getting only collision representations, footprints and bounding boxes that match a specific name

Version 0.14.0 (Release date: 2014-01-14)
-----------------------------------------
- provided some constructors for the basic markers for more convenience
- scale of markers is represented by a Size3f now
- support for more than one RigidModel visualization at a time
- adapted MarkerVisualization to improved LineStripObject

Version 0.13.2 (Release date: 2013-11-15)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed bug in RigidModelVisualization that prevented redrawing of rigid models from remote providers
- Show exceptions in RigidModelVisualization that occure while creating the visual representation of the model

Version 0.13.1 (Release date: 2013-06-12)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed destruction order for scene nodes and visualization objects in Marker class

Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2013-04-16)
-----------------------------------------
- Added polygon marker class and fixed bug in serialization of class Marker

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2013-03-19)
-----------------------------------------
- Added marker class and marker visualization

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed calculation of inner radius for Footprint
- Fixed visible property for collision bounding box visualization of RigidModel
- Removed unneeded cast operators

Version 0.10.1 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- Using ServiceProperty for model provider in RigidModelVisualization

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- CollisionTest::initialize() now also allows to specify the cell size and the angular precision
- Fixed clipping of model

Version 0.9.2 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
----------------------------------------
- JointPublisherView: fixed typo in name of internal method
- Fixed typos in documentation

Version 0.9.1 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
----------------------------------------
- RMDF: Fixed bug when polygon of footprint was not in clockwise order and footprint was merged with other collision geometries

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- Fixed calculation of inner radius for Footprint
- Fixed visible property for collision bounding box visualization of RigidModel
- Removed unneeded cast operators

Version 0.10.1 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- Using ServiceProperty for model provider in RigidModelVisualization

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- CollisionTest::initialize() now also allows to specify the cell size and the angular precision
- Fixed clipping of model

Version 0.9.2 (Release date: 2012-07-30)
----------------------------------------
- JointPublisherView: fixed typo in name of internal method
- Fixed typos in documentation

Version 0.9.1 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
----------------------------------------
- RMDF: Fixed bug when polygon of footprint was not in clockwise order and footprint was merged with other collision geometries

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: PlotVisualization
item.description: The 2D plot view and plot visualization base classes.This requires the qwt library to be installed.
item.author: Tim Langner
item.changelog:
Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- made compile with gcc 4.7.x
- added export to CSV functionality
- now updating legend by channel name + member to plot
- added grid, panning, zooming and magnifying functionality to plot
- plotted timestamps are now shown in local time

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed plotting poses

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- made to compile with qwt6

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: Navigation
item.description: Datatypes that are shared among all 'task-based' navigationconcepts. Provides classes for the most important tasks(PositionTask, OrientationTask, etc.)
item.author: Tim Langner
item.changelog:
Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- added orientation to person task parameter to describe desired person
position relative to the robot in polar coordinates
- current task can now be stopped by right clicking with the goal tool

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- added added missing const getSubTask() method
- added PathFollowTask

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
-----------------------------------------
- added goal frame to DockingTask

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: Navigation

- GoalTool now uses correct frame ids for the goal pose when sending a task to INavigation

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- added orientation to person task parameter to describe desired person
position relative to the robot in polar coordinates
- current task can now be stopped by right clicking with the goal tool

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- added added missing const getSubTask() method
- added PathFollowTask

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
-----------------------------------------
- added goal frame to DockingTask

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: Navigation
item.description: Datatypes that are shared among all 'task-based' navigationconcepts. Provides classes for the most important tasks(PositionTask, OrientationTask, etc.)
item.author: Tim Langner
item.changelog:
Version 0.16.0 (Release date: 2013-06-12)
-----------------------------------------
- made subtasks of Task a property
- removed old AstronautTask (which was replaced by the DockingTask)
- fixed TaskVisualization for null tasks

Version 0.15.0 (Release date: 2013-05-07)
-----------------------------------------
- added KeepDistanceTask

Version 0.14.0 (Release date: 2013-04-16)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed Eigen alignment bug for some task classes

Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2013-02-22)
-----------------------------------------
- moved localization related classes to Localization toolbox
- added frame ids to PositionTask and OrientationTask
- GoalTool now uses correct frame ids for the goal pose when sending a task to INavigation

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- added orientation to person task parameter to describe desired person
position relative to the robot in polar coordinates
- current task can now be stopped by right clicking with the goal tool

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- added added missing const getSubTask() method
- added PathFollowTask

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
-----------------------------------------
- added goal frame to DockingTask

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version
