item.name: CommonVisualization
item.description: The 2D and 3D visualizations and property editor delegatesfor all important base datatypes (e.g. Pose, PoseVector,Boxes, Meshes, Colors, Transforms, etc.)
item.author: Tim Langner;Erik Einhorn
item.changelog:
Version 0.14.3 (Release date: 2014-01-20)
-----------------------------------------
- PoseVisualization: fixed visualization bug for static frame channels (only one data element)

Version 0.14.2 (Release date: 2014-01-14)
-----------------------------------------
- adapted BoxVisualization, PathVisualization, PoseVisualization and
RangeCircleVisualization to improved LineStripObject

Version 0.14.1 (Release date: 2013-11-15)
-----------------------------------------
- pose text view can now show the untransformed pose
- added visualization for a single box channel
- box visualization now supports different line widths

Version 0.14.0 (Release date: 2013-08-28)
-----------------------------------------
- adapted to changes in channel API
- Pose Visualization additionally allows to visualize the trail as line strip

Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2013-06-12)
-----------------------------------------
- added MeshVectorVisualization for visualizing meshes at each pose
within a pose vector
- added RangeCircleVisualization for displaying and measuring distances
- added roproperty for image size to image visualization

Version 0.12.1 (Release date: 2013-03-19)
-----------------------------------------
- most visualizations now use the latest available transforms

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed alignment issue in PathVisualization
- added property editor delegates for Color::RGB and Color::RGBA
- made compile with gcc 4.7.x
- PathVisualization now uses LineStripObject
- made compile with latest compiler versions

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- added 3D visualizations for Rect2f and Polygons
- only transform channels of type Pose if they exist as nodes in the transform tree

Version 0.10.1 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- added transparency to 2d image visualization
- minor fixes

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
-----------------------------------------
- added export symbols for windows support

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version

item.name: CommonVisualization
item.description: The 2D and 3D visualizations and property editor delegatesfor all important base datatypes (e.g. Pose, PoseVector,Boxes, Meshes, Colors, Transforms, etc.)
item.author: Tim Langner;Erik Einhorn
item.changelog:
Version 0.14.7 (Release date: 2014-07-20)
-----------------------------------------
- Added visualization for std::vectors of Line2i, Line2f and Line2d in 3D view.
- PoseVisualization now allows to visualize poses that are not part of the transform tree.
- For MeshVectorVisualization a second optional input channel (vector<uint32>)
can be used to visualize different meshes for each id

Version 0.14.6 (Release date: 2014-05-14)
-----------------------------------------
- now always using 3D pose visualizations as default display in 3D view,
to display 2D poses correctly that are connected to 3D poses
- added Frame Publisher View for manually editing frames
- fixed enabling/disabling 3D PathVisualization

Version 0.14.5 (Release date: 2014-04-15)
-----------------------------------------
- added offset to GroundPlaneVisualization

Version 0.14.4 (Release date: 2014-03-19)
-----------------------------------------
- added VectorVisualization for Eigen::Vector2, Eigen::Vector3, Eigen::VectorX

Version 0.14.3 (Release date: 2014-01-20)
-----------------------------------------
- PoseVisualization: fixed visualization bug for static frame channels (only one data element)

Version 0.14.2 (Release date: 2014-01-14)
-----------------------------------------
- adapted BoxVisualization, PathVisualization, PoseVisualization and
RangeCircleVisualization to improved LineStripObject

Version 0.14.1 (Release date: 2013-11-15)
-----------------------------------------
- pose text view can now show the untransformed pose
- added visualization for a single box channel
- box visualization now supports different line widths

Version 0.14.0 (Release date: 2013-08-28)
-----------------------------------------
- adapted to changes in channel API
- Pose Visualization additionally allows to visualize the trail as line strip

Version 0.13.0 (Release date: 2013-06-12)
-----------------------------------------
- added MeshVectorVisualization for visualizing meshes at each pose
within a pose vector
- added RangeCircleVisualization for displaying and measuring distances
- added roproperty for image size to image visualization

Version 0.12.1 (Release date: 2013-03-19)
-----------------------------------------
- most visualizations now use the latest available transforms

Version 0.12.0 (Release date: 2013-01-24)
-----------------------------------------
- fixed alignment issue in PathVisualization
- added property editor delegates for Color::RGB and Color::RGBA
- made compile with gcc 4.7.x
- PathVisualization now uses LineStripObject
- made compile with latest compiler versions

Version 0.11.0 (Release date: 2012-10-29)
-----------------------------------------
- added 3D visualizations for Rect2f and Polygons
- only transform channels of type Pose if they exist as nodes in the transform tree

Version 0.10.1 (Release date: 2012-09-25)
-----------------------------------------
- added transparency to 2d image visualization
- minor fixes

Version 0.10.0 (Release date: 2012-07-05)
-----------------------------------------
- added export symbols for windows support

Version 0.9.0 (Release date: 2012-04-27)
----------------------------------------
- initial version
